DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Improve Prolapse Using Femmeze速 ( v1 )
DOC.detailed_description: Aim Evaluate feasibility Femmeze速 device improve management posterior vaginal compartment prolapse address implementation intervention preliminary effectiveness . Objectives - demonstrate effectiveness device ( comfort , ease use , empty rectum stool easily current approach quality life ) - identify stage prolapse device would suitable - identify change device instruction use ( needs adjustment design term length/width ) The study use pre-post intervention design aim evaluate feasibility intervention ( use device ) ; identify implementation issue preliminary effectiveness . The participant follow prospectively compare device usual care . Usual care context use finger help empty rectum stool . Participants invite complete semi-structured interview understand live experience . A Patient Public Involvement Group contribute improve study method .
DOC.criteria: Adult woman ( 18 year age ) symptom obstructive defaecation Not undergone posterior vaginal compartment prolapse surgery Cognitive impairment Hand disability Refuse give inform consent Pregnancy Less 12 week postpartum Neurological disease
